channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These Happy Couples Aren't Sharing Bank Accounts---They're Sharing Spreadsheets
item.description: Spouses search for a better way to divide their household expenses.

item.title: Dexcom shares plunge more than 40% for worst day on record
item.description: Dexcom, which had its stock market debut in 2005, had its worst day ever after lowering its full-year guidance.

item.title: Why the Great Stock Rotation Is Skipping Consumer Staples
item.description: Uneven earnings and worries about the U.S. consumer are dragging on the sector.

item.title: Dexcom shares plummet almost 40% after company misses on revenue, lowers guidance
item.description: Dexcom issued disappointing results and guidance, which the company attributed in part to a change in its salesforce.

item.title: Investors Gobble Up Bonds That Can Turn Into Stocks
item.description: Lyft, Snap and others are raising money by issuing convertible bonds.

item.title: Bristol Myers Squibb beats earnings estimates, raises outlook as drugmaker slashes costs
item.description: The results come as Bristol Myers moves to cut $1.5 billion in costs by 2025 and reinvest that money into key drug brands and research and development programs.

item.title: Bill Ackman's Pershing Square Plans to Proceed With IPO
item.description: The NYSE says that the listing was “pending on a date to be announced.”

item.title: Strong earnings from industrial AI play Dover prove the stock belongs in our portfolio
item.description: Shares of Dover, which has exposure to artificial intelligence and the biopharma recovery, jumped more than 6% on the report.

item.title: The Score: Delta Air Lines, Tesla, Warner Bros. Discovery and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: Southwest profit falls 46% as airline takes 'urgent' steps to increase revenue
item.description: Southwest is under pressure from an activist investor after it lagged competitors.
